location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Kaye, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing the first of exchange of two bills (not present) on the Marine Paymaster for the salary and supplies for Stephen Watson Henshaw, the Marine Agent. It notes that the Marine Agent is also in the habit for sending private applications to the Gideon Colquhoun at Bussora [Basra].
